name: Super Mario on Scratch Remastered - HTML Port
name_original: Super Mario on Scratch Remastered - HTML Port
description:
This is Super Mario on Scratch Remastered that is now ported to itch.io!

It may take a little while to load.

Here is the game running on Scratch https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/405161625/

Credits -

Flughand - Feblu

Super Mario 64 - Bob-omb Battlefield [Remix] by Qumu

ANOMALIE - MÉTROPOLE

Nintendo for Mario and most of the sounds/music. 

Me for most of the art.

Mario text style by Olivermario12 on Scratch

Scrolling engine by griffpatch on Scratch

Intro by 27jdbloom on Scratch
